comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

comment.body:
> Porn and warez sites also illegal in some countries, but we do not block them. @Eugene-Savenko Please take a look.

Hello to all administrators and members of the Adguard Team. I would like to introduce myself as one of the certified authors of the reported website. The project I have been working on in the community involves creating iOS system shortcuts, which are completely free for users to utilize. The individual who reported us is simply someone who intentionally spreads false information about others, and there have been numerous similar cases in the past. Within our community, this reporter has already gained a notorious reputation. Please feel free to conduct a thorough investigation. It is important to note that the reported website is fully compliant with Chinese laws and regulations, and it has undergone the necessary registration procedures. Through my investigation, I have discovered that the person behind the report is a primary school student, just over ten years old. I kindly request you to examine the matter carefully. Thank you.

> 嘿！看起来有问题的网站有点像用户脚本/快捷方式的商店。如果碰巧有任何可能被视为恶意软件的脚本，请与我们分享。一旦我们确认脚本确实是恶意的，我们将立即禁止该网站。同时，我们没有找到任何理由屏蔽该网站，但我们衷心感谢您的举报！💚

Hello to all administrators and members of the Adguard Team. I would like to introduce myself as one of the certified authors of the reported website. The project I have been working on in the community involves creating iOS system shortcuts, which are completely free for users to utilize. The individual who reported us is simply someone who intentionally spreads false information about others, and there have been numerous similar cases in the past. Within our community, this reporter has already gained a notorious reputation. Please feel free to conduct a thorough investigation. It is important to note that the reported website is fully compliant with Chinese laws and regulations, and it has undergone the necessary registration procedures. Through my investigation, I have discovered that the person behind the report is a primary school student, just over ten years old. I kindly request you to examine the matter carefully. Thank you.

comment.body:
@LASuspect
добавьте в пользовательский фильтр правила
```
ya.ru#@#.alice-fab
ya.ru#@#.alice-fab__promo
```
или выключите фильтр раздражителей (он состоит из нескольких частей) и включите эти (без фильтра попапов/всплывающего мусора)
AdGuard Cookie Notices filter
AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter
AdGuard Other Annoyances filter
AdGuard Widgets filter

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://onual.com/forum/showthread.php?tid=19306](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonual.com%2Fforum%2Fshowthread.php%3Ftid%3D19306) ### Comment Username: @szolnok7 > 4-5 gün önce AgGuard mobil deneme üyeliğini başlattım. Sitenizde tavsiye edilen bütün ayarlamaların doğru olduğuna eminim, ancak hiç bir reklam engellenmiyor. URL olarak verdiğim sadece bir örnek. Bilgisayarımda da AdGuard kullanıyorum. Aynı sitelerdeki reklamları engelliyor, ancak Safari kullanırken AdGuard Mobil versiyonu hiç bir reklamı engellemiyor. Deneme üyeliğim 2 gün sonra bitiyor. Deneme üyeliğim bitmeden sizlerden çözüm beklemekteyim. ### Screenshots

Also, please update your filters and reload the website if it does not help.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.cloudflare.com/ssl/encrypted-sni/#results](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cloudflare.com%2Fssl%2Fencrypted-sni%2F%23results) ### Comment > Encrypted ClientHello в AdGuard не сумісна з vpn режимом Opera. При ввімкненні в додаткових налаштуваннях AdGuard функцію "Використовувати Encrypted ClientHello" в браузері opera, якщо ввімкнути vpn, то ні один сайт не відкривається. При вимиканні Encrypted ClientHello сайти із ввімкненим vpn в opera відображаються нормально, також все працює нормально, якщо навпаки – вимкнути vpn-режим в op[era та ввімкнути Encrypted ClientHello в AdGuard. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Should be blocked by this rule: `cdn.privacy-mgmt.com#%#AG_onLoad(function(){if(window.self!==window.top&&document.referrer.startsWith("https://www.space.com/")){var a=new MutationObserver(function(){var b=document.querySelector('.message-component > button[title="AGREE"]');b&&(a.disconnect(),b.click())});a.observe(document,{childList:!0,subtree:!0});setTimeout(function(){a.disconnect()},1E4)}});`
Please try to copy and paste it into a user filter.

comment.body:
> Hey there! It looks like the website in question is sort of a store for user scripts / shortcuts. If there happen to be any scripts that could be considered malware, please share them with us. Once we verify that the scripts are indeed malicious, we'll promptly ban the website. In the meantime, we don't find any reason to block the website, but we sincerely appreciate your report! 💚 
> 
> 
> 
> 

The shortcuts inside this site do leak users' private data, such as device information, IP addresses, etc., to the scammers' servers, which is totally contrary to the AdGuard philosophy!

### I earnestly hope that adguard bans this site!🙏

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.cloudflare.com/ssl/encrypted-sni/#results](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cloudflare.com%2Fssl%2Fencrypted-sni%2F%23results) ### Comment > Encrypted ClientHello в AdGuard не сумісна з vpn режимом Opera. При ввімкненні в додаткових налаштуваннях AdGuard функцію "Використовувати Encrypted ClientHello" в браузері opera, якщо ввімкнути vpn, то ні один сайт не відкривається. При вимиканні Encrypted ClientHello сайти із ввімкненим vpn в opera відображаються нормально, також все працює нормально, якщо навпаки – вимкнути vpn-режим в op[era та ввімкнути Encrypted ClientHello в AdGuard. ### Screenshots

issue.title: HTTPS certificate confirmation issues of certain applications.

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android, AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

3.6.11

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Website or app doesn't work properly, Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://tubemate.net

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Protect from DPI

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Symptoms
 When using some application, inform shown below shows and ads won't be blocked or cannot use application at all.

For now, 2 applications majorly that I use is the problem.
1) Tubemate : 
https://tubemate.net
2) SPOTV NOW : 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kr.co.spotvnow.app&hl=ko&gl=US&referrer=utm_source%3Dgoogle%26utm_medium%3Dorganic%26utm_term%3Dspotvnow&pcampaignid=APPU_1_VuZrZOySGcOK-Qbgg79o

Especially for the second version, I think this app detects adguard and blocks connection itself when using adguard.

2. Screenshots
<details>
<summary>App does not approve HTTPS certificate</summary>

![Screenshot_20230523-065714_Chrome](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/36753565/6c5c7c75-97c7-4376-854d-6278f3f55330)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://store.steampowered.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstore.steampowered.com%2F) ### Comment > store.steampowered.com #151641 > > Здравствуйте, такая проблема, при приключённом Adguard не работает функция в Steam под названием что нового, отключаешь Adguard, функция что нового начинает работать. Данная функция или настройка никак не относится к рекламе. Пришлю скриншот что она делает. > > Alex-302 commented 24 minutes ago > Не вижу такой раздел. Опишите как туда перейти. > > Включаете Steam, Вверху раздел БИБЛИОТЕКА, выбираете домашняя страница и раздел что нового должен быть в самом вверху и потом уже раздел недавние игры. > > На сайте и в программе этого раздела нет > > Проверьте, если выключить модуль блокировки рекламы > > Проблема осталась, этот раздел есть, не мне вас учить, но включите Steam, потом в левом верхнем углу выберите Steam, потом Проверить наличие обновлений клиента Steam, обновляете Steam, выключаете его, потом выключаете Adguard без возможности работать в фоновом режиме и обновлении фильтров и снова включаете Steam и увидите этот раздел, если хотя бы запускали 1 игру недавно. ### Screenshots

### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
